Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • HumanPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener, Player

    public class HumanPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Player, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Class implementation for a human player. Impelements the player and MouseListener interfaces.
    Version:
    5/25/2020
    Author:
    Vivek Alumootil, Mihir Kelkar, Period - 4, Assignment - APCS Final Project Connect 4, Sources - None
